trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示一套<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The DataKeyArray class is used to store and manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects.
trans-unit.target: DataKeyArray 类用于存储和管理集合的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object represents the primary key of a record in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象表示的数据绑定控件中的记录的主键。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: In general, data-bound controls that display multiple records (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) use a DataKeyArray object to store the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects for the records displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下，数据绑定控件显示的多个记录 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件) DataKeyArray 对象用于存储<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>控件中显示的记录的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The DataKeyArray class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.Item%2A> indexer to directly retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object from the collection at a specific zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: DataKeyArray 类支持多种方法可访问集合中的项:-使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.Item%2A>索引器以直接检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>从集合中特定的从零开始索引处的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.GetEnumerator%2A> method to retrieve an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: -使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.GetEnumerator%2A>方法来检索可用于循环访问集合的枚举。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the items in the collection into an array, which can then be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: -使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.CopyTo%2A>方法以将项复制到一个数组，用于访问集合中的项集合中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the total number of items in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定集合中项的总数，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.Count%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> class using the specified <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>类使用指定<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>对象。</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> object contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects with which to populate the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>对象包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>用来填充集合的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> objects with which to populate the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref>的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>用来填充集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from this collection to the specified array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> objects, starting at the specified index in the array.
trans-unit.target: 将此集合中的所有项都复制到指定的数组<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>对象，数组中的指定索引处开始。

trans-unit.source: Use the CopyTo method to copy the items from the collection into the specified array, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: CopyTo 方法用于将项从指定的数组，从指定索引处开始将集合复制。

trans-unit.source: The array can then be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 该数组然后用于访问集合中的项。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must use a zero-based array for the `array` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 必须使用一数组从零开始的`array`参数。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> objects that receives the copied items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个从零开始的数组<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>接收复制的项集合中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The first index in the specified array to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: 指定要接收复制的内容的数组中的第一个索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合中项的数目。

trans-unit.source: Use the Count property to determine the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Count 属性用于确定集合中的项的数目。

trans-unit.source: The Count property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine its upper bound.
trans-unit.target: Count 属性常用当循环访问集合以确定其上限。

trans-unit.source: The Count property is also commonly used to determine whether a collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Count 属性通常还用于确定集合是否为空。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的项的数目。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that contains all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个枚举器包含所有<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>集合中的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the GetEnumerator method to get an enumerator that can be iterated through linearly to access each item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用的 GetEnumerator 方法以获取可以按线性方式循环访问集合中的每个项的枚举。

trans-unit.source: To access the item at the current position in the enumerator, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问的枚举器中当前位置处的项，使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move to the next item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法将移动到集合中的下一项。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To move the enumerator to its initial position, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将枚举器移到其初始位置，使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you initially get the enumerator or use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection, you must call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 最初获取枚举数或时使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法将枚举器移到的第一项在集合中，必须调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 否则，表示的项<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性是不确定。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object that contains all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-实现对象，其中包含所有<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>集合中的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the items in the collection can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以修改集合中的项。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsReadOnly property to determine whether the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> collection can be modified.
trans-unit.target: IsReadOnly 属性用于确定是否中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>可以修改集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property has been overridden to always return `false`, to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> object can be added or removed.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 已经替代此属性始终返回`false`，以指示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>中的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>可以添加或移除对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects themselves cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象本身不能更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"></xref> collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"></xref>集合已同步 （线程安全）。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsSynchronized property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> object is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 使用 IsSynchronized 属性来确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>对象是线程安全。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property has been overridden to always return `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> object is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 已经替代此属性始终返回`false`，则指示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>对象不是线程安全。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the IsSynchronized property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: IsSynchronized 属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>接口。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object from the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>从集合中指定索引处的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object from the collection at the specified index, using array notation.
trans-unit.target: 使用此索引器检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>从集合中使用数组表示法的指定索引处的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> to retrieve from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>若要从集合中检索。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"> </xref>集合中的指定索引处。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于同步对集合的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the SyncRoot property to get an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SyncRoot 属性来获取可用于同步对集合的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> object itself.
trans-unit.target: 在此实现中返回的对象是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>对象本身。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the SyncRoot property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: SyncRoot 属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>接口。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>可用于同步对集合的访问。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from this collection to the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting at the specified index in the <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 将此集合中的所有项都复制到指定<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>中的指定索引处开始， <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the ICollection.CopyTo method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> class to copy the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> collection into the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 此实现的 ICollection.CopyTo 方法是使用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>类中的项复制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>到指定的集合<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>指定索引处开始。</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> can then be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>用于访问集合中的项。</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must use a zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> for the `array` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 必须使用从零开始<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>为`array`参数。</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> that receives the copied items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> ，它从集合接收复制的项。

trans-unit.source: The first index in the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的第一个索引<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>以接收复制的内容。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"></xref> object is tracking its view-state changes.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"></xref>对象是否在跟踪其视图状态更改。

trans-unit.source: The IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState property is used to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> object is tracking its view-state changes.
trans-unit.target: IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState 属性用于确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>对象是否在跟踪其视图状态更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 主要由控件开发人员使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"></xref> is tracking its view-state changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"></xref>是否在跟踪其视图状态更改; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 加载以前保存的视图状态的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The IStateManager.LoadViewState method is used to load the previously saved view state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> object.
trans-unit.target: IStateManager.LoadViewState 方法用于加载以前保存的视图状态的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示状态的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Saves the current view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将当前视图状态保存<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The IStateManager.SaveViewState method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> class to save the state of the object.
trans-unit.target: IStateManager.SaveViewState 方法是使用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>类以保存对象的状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the saved state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，其中包含的已保存的状态<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Marks the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving view-state changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 标记开始跟踪并视图状态将更改保存到的起始点<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden to mark the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving changes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> object as part of the object's view state.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以将标记开始跟踪并将更改保存到的起始点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>对象作为对象的视图状态的一部分。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>
